content: this bead stitch crochet sweater pattern includes 9 page written pattern and photo tutorial as well as a link to the video tutorial to make it as smooth as possible this pattern includes us women s sizes xs-xxl any questions you may come across in making this pattern will be answered inside but if not feel free to message me materials #4 medium weight yarn i used lion brand jeans vaqueros #4 medium weight yarn crochet hooks size 5mm and 6mm scissors yarn needle stitch markers notes the pattern is written in english us terminology the pattern is made as us women s sizes xs s m l xl xxl the pattern is made in 4 separate pieces and then sewn together front and back panels are made the same in this picture i have demonstrated with size small yarn needed 910 960 1 010 1 110 1 160 1 210 yards gauge blocked 12 double_crochet x 6 row = 4 measurements after blocked xs = 19 66 width across back x 19 83 length s = 21 66 width across back x 19 83 length m = 23 66 width across back x 19 83 length l = 25 66 width across back x 22 50 length xl = 27 66 width across back x 22 50 length xxl = 29 66 width across back x 22 50 length thanks for stopping by happy crocheting
